function.name: DeleteCreatedSpawnGroups()
function.DescriptionEN: DeleteCreatedSpawnGroups() : Deletes any spawn groups that this point_template has spawned. Note: The point_template will not be deleted by this.
function.DescriptionCN: 删除任何该点模板的刷新组。提示：并不删除点模板

function.name: ForceSpawn
function.DescriptionEN: ForceSpawn() : Spawns all of the entities the point_template is pointing at.
function.DescriptionCN: 强制刷新该点模板指向的全部实体

function.name: GetSpawnedEntities
function.DescriptionEN: GetSpawnedEntities() : Get the list of the most recent spawned entities
function.DescriptionCN: 获取最近被刷新的实体

function.name: SetSpawnCallback()
function.DescriptionEN: SetSpawnCallback( hCallbackFunc, hCallbackScope, hCallbackData ) : Set a callback for when the template spawns entities. The spawned entities will be passed in as an array.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置刷新回调（hCallbackFunc, hCallbackScope, hCallbackData ），当模板产生实体时回调。被刷新的实体作为数组被传入
